level.heading: Transition.
level.text: For a period of 12 months following January 25, 2014, all references in this chapter to "trauma technologists" shall be deemed to refer to persons meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether they are licensed in fact.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2014 amendment by D.C. Law 20-64 added this section.
